markdownRemark.html: A simple black dress becomes a statement with the right accessories. Bold earrings, a vintage belt, a structured bagâ€”each piece adds personality and tells your story. This is where your creativity truly shines.

frontmatter.title: Accessories are the exclamation point of a woman's outfit
